personalInfo.name: Khairil
personalInfo.title: FrontEnd Develover
personalInfo.bio: I'm an Information Systems student who loves programming, especially Front-End Development. I'm committed to improving my skills and knowledge to keep up with the latest technology.

projects.title: Sobat Takwa
projects.description: The web application provides a user-friendly interface with access to prayer schedules, Quran reading with audio support, and daily prayers, all featuring a search function.

projects.title: Saas NotesApp
projects.description: This SaaS app, built with Next.js, Stripe, Kinde, Prisma, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS with Shadcn UI, lets users manage notes and subscribe to premium services. Free users can create up to 5 notes before subscribing for unlimited access. Features include a Stripe Customer Portal, Stripe Checkout, server-side implementation, full CRUD for notes, and customizable color themes.

projects.title: Aku Mahasigma
projects.description: A web-based application for searching and displaying student information from universities across Indonesia, featuring a user-friendly and efficient interface.

projects.title: Age Calculator
projects.description: This is a simple web application that allows users to calculate their age by entering their date of birth.

education.institution: Islamic State University Imam Bonjol Padang
education.description: I have partially completed my studies in information systems.

I completed a specialized course at Dicoding Academy focused on creating front-end web applications with JavaScript, React, and Node.js. For my final project, I developed a web-based to-do list and note application, and I learned how to design and implement responsive, scalable, and secure web applications.
